description:
On November 23–24, 2025, I was defrauded via a fake “Shido official” Telegram account . The scammer tricked me into approving transactions and/or sending funds directly, resulting in the theft of the following assets from my wallets:• Solana: 3.52 SOL + ~8,300 BULLISH (~663 CAD)  • Ethereum: ETH, JOE, SHIDO, TEL tokens (~535 CAD total)  • Stellar: 497.98 XLM (~177 CAD)  • XRPL: 1,159.28 XRP (~3,407 CAD)  Total estimated loss: ≈ 4,594 CADKey scammer-controlled addresses • Solana: EkaajdZSwf4SAWLdYUdh2Zq1bzLYuJ6jZ3BXRNqB8  • Ethereum main collection wallet: 0x7773b2D4d8C490F4adbb8fAc029d33995aa068  • Stellar destination: GAWJGLPF5MNORZBKNS44YFQFXKFBEP7HWJITYCLU45W7  • XRPL destination: r4rVA3GZZ3bJh1zJrYrVDPBnfsYKXP23SeAll transactions occurred within hours on Nov 23–24, 2025. Funds were rapidly swapped (Jupiter Aggregator, Uniswap V3) and bridged/laundered.

On November 23–24, 2025, I was defrauded via a fake “Shido official” Telegram account . The scammer tricked me into approving transactions and/or sending funds directly, resulting in the theft of the following assets from my wallets:

• Solana: 3.52 SOL + ~8,300 BULLISH (~663 CAD)

• Ethereum: ETH, JOE, SHIDO, TEL tokens (~535 CAD total)

• Stellar: 497.98 XLM (~177 CAD)

• XRPL: 1,159.28 XRP (~3,407 CAD)

Total estimated loss: ≈ 4,594 CAD

Key scammer-controlled addresses

• Solana: EkaajdZSwf4SAWLdYUdh2Zq1bzLYuJ6jZ3BXRNqB8

• Ethereum main collection wallet: 0x7773b2D4d8C490F4adbb8fAc029d33995aa068

• Stellar destination: GAWJGLPF5MNORZBKNS44YFQFXKFBEP7HWJITYCLU45W7

• XRPL destination: r4rVA3GZZ3bJh1zJrYrVDPBnfsYKXP23Se

All transactions occurred within hours on Nov 23–24, 2025. Funds were rapidly swapped (Jupiter Aggregator, Uniswap V3) and bridged/laundered.

Amount lost
